notes: The orchestrator reads local OpenClaw docs from docsPath and OpenAI Cookbook from cookbookPath; ensure sync_docs_sources.sh (or sync_openclaw_docs.sh + sync_openai_cookbook.sh) keeps both mirrors current. LLM settings for reddit-helper: openaiModel (gpt-4), openaiMaxTokens (300), openaiTemperature (0.7). Digest delivery: digestNotificationChannel and digestNotificationTarget. Nightly batch at 11pm UTC; morning notification at 6am UTC. Milestone delivery: set milestoneIngestUrl to the openclawdbot /internal/milestones/ingest URL and MILESTONE_SIGNING_SECRET env var to enable live milestone push.
